summary: Provides utility methods for creating diverse numeric inputs—such as ranges, infinities, NaNs, linearly spaced arrays, and scalars—to facilitate unit testing of the GPU-accelerated gamma function in the cupyx SciPy special module.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and compatibility of the cupyx implementation of the gamma function across a wide spectrum of edge‑case and typical values, ensuring it matches expected SciPy behavior on GPU hardware.
